name: Pixel art
objective:
Move the %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs down of as many squares as their number to discover the hidden image.
Then bring %%icon icon-hero$%% heroes all the way down.

%%icon mdi mdi-information-outline$%% Use %%statement assign-statement$calc%% and %%icon icon-variable$%% %%statement assign-statement$ a%% variable to count your steps.
